title: I don't know how you get away with it.
body:
You destroy the game further and further each year, you lie to our faces, you sell out to a Chinese greed conglomerate, you put so little back into the game... you are the epitome of a terrible company, and yet everyone worships you and throws money at you.

Really wish people retained some kind of mental ability with the latest generation. There was a time we laughed F2P cash grabs out of the industry, and shitware devs didn't get anywhere.

How do you get away with it?
